iiv.data

Class CNUScale

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.data.CNUScale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    iiVScriptable

    public class CNUScale
extends Object
implements iiVScriptable
    CNUScale contains parameters and tools for scaling voxel values from one range of values to another with thresholding.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CNUScale(double scaleFactor)
      Constructs a new instance of CNUScale.

      • quantificationAdjusted

        public CNUScale quantificationAdjusted(double quantification)
        Creates a duplicate instance adjusted to a different quantification factor. This allows keeping the same quantified values from different sources scaled to the same output values.
        Parameters:
        quantification - quantification factor for duplicate
        Returns:
        duplicate adjusted to quantification factor

        public void updateIdentityState()
        Updates identity state to match all current values. Called internally when ever a value is changed.

      • setQuantificationState

        public void setQuantificationState(boolean quantificationState)
        Sets the quantification mode. This doesn't affect scaling but may be used to decide how to display values.
        Parameters:
        quantificationState - true to consider quantification on

      • getQuantificationState

        public boolean getQuantificationState()
        Returns quantification mode.
        Returns:
        true to consider quantification on

      • setToFitDataInRange

        public void setToFitDataInRange(int inType)
        Sets scale and translation to squeeze a range, taken from current threshMin and threshMax, into an output range taken from current threshMaxValue and threshMaxValue.
        Parameters:
        inType - type of data to scale into range

      • setToFitDataInRange

        public void setToFitDataInRange(double inMin,
                                double inMax,
                                double outMin,
                                double outMax,
                                boolean threshold)
        Sets scale and translation to squeeze a range of input data into an output range.
        Parameters:
        inMin - minimum value of input data
        inMax - maximum value of input data
        outMin - minimum value for output data
        outMax - maximum value for output data
        threshold - true to enable thresholding

      • setToDisplayDefault

        public void setToDisplayDefault(int inType)
        Sets scale and translation to default for displaying with 8-bit display.
        Parameters:
        inType - type of data to scale into range

      • setToDisplayPositive

        public void setToDisplayPositive(int inType)
        Sets scale and translation to default for displaying only positive values with 8-bit display.
        Parameters:
        inType - type of data to scale into range

      • setToDisplayNegative

        public void setToDisplayNegative(int inType)
        Sets scale and translation to default for displaying only negative values with 8-bit display.
        Parameters:
        inType - type of data to scale into range

      • setScaleFactor_for_max_res

        public void setScaleFactor_for_max_res(int inType,
                                       int outType)
        Sets the scale factor to maximumn factor to store a given data type as a given output data type.
        Parameters:
        inType - type of data to scale into range
        outType - type of data to determine output range for

      • setScaleFactor_for_max_res

                                       int outType)
        Sets the scale factor to maximumn factor to store a range of values as a given data type.
        Parameters:
        inMin - minimum value of input data
        inMax - maximum value of input data
        outType - type of data to determine output range for
